name: DopeNet (itch)
description:
Welcome to DopeNet - the world's #1 fantasy drug dealing simulator. Emphasis on FANTASY. If you think drugs are cool, take a hike, bozo!

Log in now for a fast-paced digital selling spree!  Buy low and sell high, take risks and stack chip - all while avoiding the feds, basement dwelling hackers and butthurt dating app rejects.

Unleash the degenerate within. Embrace the spirit of the dark web. Be one with shit tier 1998 design aesthetics - all from the safety of your home, with no actual risk, but real actual fun.
